page.title: 13Clubs and Organizations
page.content:
Here are some{clubs}that some children go to in Callington. I go to{Brownies}every Thursday. It is interesting, you play games and sing songs. I would like to be a Guide and go to camp. I go to{Prim-Raf Drama group.}Every season we do a pantomime where everybody has a part in dancing or acting. There is a party afterwards.
I go to {Majorettes. }I go on Tuesday nights from 6.30 to 8.30. I pay 40p for subs. I practice with a baton and the band practice their music. I go to{Pottery Club. }I go on wednesdays from 3.40 to 5.00. When I first went I started making hand pots. Then I painted patterns on them. I enjoy it very much every Wednesday.
